short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate OpenAI responses in any text field

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mannat.io gives access to the power of ChatGPT everywhere on the internet.  You can ask it to write you a piece of content in almost all the text fields you can think of. 

How does it work?
- any site with a text field.
-start your prompt with :: then write your prompt (::what is the age of the earth?)
- when you are ready press CTRL + SHIFT + K or CTRL+ALT +SHIFT + K
**within 10 sec your prompt will be replaced with the output.
